title: League of legends main screen and chat keep disconnecting
body:
as you can see in the pictures my game + chat keep disconnecting while iam in the main league screen, i cant choose any role exept support cuz the queue is too long and after 2mins the main screen disconnecting and its reset the queue.
after i join a game as support the game works fine without any dc's and when i finish the game i cant see the lobby to see the stats and report/honor.
i flushed my dns,opened ports..

does overwolf might cause the problem ?

https://i.gyazo.com/4cbb51970eb90ded5a5d721447000d87.png

https://i.gyazo.com/335f70857e708e386ffb973907e6bbaa.jpg

replies.body:
It definitely looks like you're disconnecting from PvP.net due to an unstable connection. There could be issues with your local network configuration or along your ISP routing. I recommend working through the rest of the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if it helps. 

Let me know you notice any change.
